requirements.summary: Deliver a single-page Rose Day themed experience with romantic copy addressed to the girlfriend and no login requirement.
acceptanceCriteria: App loads to a Rose Day themed page without requiring login
Page includes a prominent headline (e.g., “Happy Rose Day”) and a short romantic message addressed to the girlfriend
Content is readable and visually polished on both mobile and desktop

file_operations.description: Create the single-page Rose Day experience as the app root view (headline, romantic copy, sections), ensuring it renders without any authentication flow and is responsive.
Update document metadata (title/description if present) to match the Rose Day single-page experience and ensure English, romance-themed presentation.

requirements.summary: Add client-side personalization inputs for girlfriend name, sender name, and custom message with instant preview and reset-to-default.
acceptanceCriteria: UI provides input fields for girlfriend name, sender name, and a longer message
Preview updates immediately when inputs change
A “Reset to default” action restores the default sample text

file_operations.description: Add client-side state for personalization (girlfriend name, sender name, message), bind to inputs, and render an immediate preview; include a Reset to default action. Use the shadcn-ui component library (e.g., input/textarea/button/card) to provide polished form controls and consistent UI styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement an interactive “Rose Day moments” section with 3–6 accessible clickable items that toggle reveal text.
acceptanceCriteria: There are at least 3 interactive items
Each item toggles/reveals additional text on click/tap
Interactions work with keyboard navigation (tab + enter/space)

file_operations.description: Create an accessible moments component with 3–6 items implemented as keyboard-operable controls (e.g., buttons with aria-expanded) that toggle reveal/hide short romantic text. Use the shadcn-ui component library (e.g., Card) to provide consistent interactive styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the RoseDayMoments section into the single-page layout and ensure it is reachable via natural reading order and keyboard navigation.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive romantic theme (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) consistently across the single page and ensure mobile layout quality.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across sections and components
Theme does not rely on a generic/default blue-purple gradient look
Mobile layout is well-spaced with no overlapping elements

file_operations.description: Define a distinctive romantic theme using CSS variables and Tailwind-friendly base styles (warm rose/cream palette, refined typography, spacing rules) and apply global background treatment without using a generic blue-purple gradient; ensure responsive spacing to avoid overlaps on mobile.
Extend Tailwind theme tokens (e.g., brand/romantic color tokens and any typography/spacing defaults) to support consistent styling across the Rose Day page.
Apply the romantic theme consistently across sections (hero, personalization, moments, footer) using the shared theme tokens and responsive layout primitives.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images and render them as crisp, layout-stable frontend assets.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images are present in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are referenced directly by the frontend (no backend/image API)
Images display crisply on mobile and desktop and do not cause layout shifts

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero illustration asset at the required path and filename for direct frontend use.
Add the generated seamless rose-petal pattern background asset at the required path and filename for direct frontend use.
Add the generated minimal rose icon asset at the required path and filename for direct frontend use.

Render the hero illustration (frontend/public/assets/generated/rose-hero.dim_1600x900.png) and rose icon (frontend/public/assets/generated/rose-icon.dim_256x256.png) with explicit sizing to prevent layout shifts and to remain crisp on mobile/desktop.
Apply the subtle patterned background using the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/rose-pattern.dim_2048x2048.png in a way that avoids layout shifts and preserves readability.
